lines: Ciindi ca ku mupaila Cila ndilesya kunyona,
Cilandi Ôta kuya kwakwe, Kulomba nkwe ndiya ndisya;
Muzindi zya ku penge sya Kanji ndajana ku vunwa
Ndazwa mu sunko lya mubi, Mu ciindi ca ku paila.
Ciindi ca ku mu paila Mababa alanditola,
Kuli oyo usyomeka, Kuleleka moyo wangu
Ula ndi Ôta kumuyanda, Nku kondwa majwi akwe,
Ndi la kuya kulinguwe Mu ciindi caku paila.
Ciindi ca ku mu paila Kondi komanisya iwe
Limwi ndi kaye kujulu Ndi kaulukile nkuko,
Amubili uta boli; Ndila kupegwa kubotu
Ndi la ku imba mukwenda Ko cisyite kopaila.
